title: Font color in Thunderbird.

title: Socks5 or HTTP Proxy Password
content: Hello! I am sorry to trouble you. But may I know how I can set Socks5 or HTTP Proxy servers with a password? Thanks for all assistance!

title: How to set up a new email account on Thunderbird
content: i want to set up a new email account on Thunderbird as I have changed internet providers
creator: frank947

title: Oszlop méretezés
content: A csatolt képen az utolsó (itt a "Méret") mezőt nem tudom átméretezni; a nyíllal jelzett helyre kattintva nem lehet a többi oszlophoz hasonlóan összehúzni, vagy növelni. Több oszlopot sem hajlandó kijelezni, hiába vannak kijelölve mutatásra. FG
creator: informatika1

title: Access Denied
content:
Previously all of the email accounts created in thunderbird worked flawlessly, one day when checking email automatically a seperate window opened displaying the error "Access Denied", I searched the net for a solution and could not find one, it is very possible that one of the most recent linux updates may have changed something as I recall a larger than normal update just before this occurred a few days ago.

Thank you.

Access Denied You don't have permission to access "http://login.xfinity.com/login" on this server.

Reference #18.952b1eb8.1726386894.6b0a37f

https://errors.edgesuite.net/18.952b1eb8.1726386894.6b0a37f
creator: sdavers
